isis.stitle: CAB: 4100, 4200, 4300 AND 4400 MODELS - REMOVE - CAB DOOR ELECTRIC MIRROR SWITCH

svcsubproc.title: Remove Front Cab Door Electric Mirror Switch on Standard Cab, Extended Cab and Crew Cab for all Models
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 95 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove driver side front cab door electric mirror switch (Item 1) by carefully sliding a flat blade screw driver under the edge of the electric mirror switch and gently pry it out of the front cab door trim panel (Item 2), driver side shown.

Once the front cab door electric mirror switch (Item 1) is lifted out of the front cab door trim panel (Item 2), disconnect wiring harness connector (Item 3) from electric mirror switch, driver side shown. Lay it out of the way and save for installation, unless damaged and being replaced.
